languages.text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Впервые становясь целью какой-либо {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} псайкера, противник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, а у псайкера эти характеристики увеличиваются на 2 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular Psyker's ability for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 penalty to their Intelligence and Perception and the Psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker ability for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 penalty to their Intelligence and Perception, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

languages.text: Впервые становясь целью какой-либо {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} псайкера, противник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}, а у псайкера эти характеристики увеличиваются на 2 до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Впервые становясь целью какой-либо {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} псайкера, противник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 к Интеллекту и Восприятию, а у псайкера эти характеристики увеличиваются на 2 до конца боя.

Впервые становясь целью какой-либо {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} псайкера, противник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 к Интеллекту и Восприятию, а у псайкера эти характеристики увеличиваются на 2 до конца боя.

languages.text: 当任何敌人首次成为灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的目标对象时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}会受到−5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，而灵能者的智力与感知提高2点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 当任何敌人首次成为灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的目标对象时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}会受到-5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，而灵能者的智力与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高2点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: En cualquier momento en el que un enemigo se convierta por primera vez en objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del psíquico, dicho enemigo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, y tanto la Inteligencia como la Percepción del psíquico aumentan en +2 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: En cualquier momento en el que un enemigo se convierta por primera vez en objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del psíquico, dicho enemigo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, y tanto la Inteligencia como la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del psíquico aumentan en +2 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Jedes Mal, wenn ein Feind zum ersten Mal das Ziel einer bestimmten Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird, erleidet dieser Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Die Intelligenz und Wahrnehmung des Psionikers dagegen erhöht sich bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +2.
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Jedes Mal, wenn ein Feind zum ersten Mal das Ziel einer bestimmten Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird, erleidet dieser Feind einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Die Intelligenz und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Psionikers dagegen erhöht sich bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +2.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est pour la première fois la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} particulière du psyker, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de cet ennemi, et l'Intelligence et la Perception du psyker augmentent de +2 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est pour la première fois la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} particulière du psyker, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de 5 s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de cet ennemi, et l'Intelligence et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} du psyker augmentent de +2 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 敵が初めて特定の異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになった時、戦闘終了までその敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}に−5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、異能者の知覚が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 敵が初めて特定の異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットになった時、戦闘終了までその敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}に-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: Bir düşman, belirli bir ruhsezer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} ilk kez hedefi olduğunda {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliklerine −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Ruhsezerin Zekâ ve Algı nitelikleriyse 2'şer puan artar. Etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Any time an enemy becomes a target of any particular psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time, this enemy suffers a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and the psyker's Intelligence and Perception increase by +2 until the end of combat.
